lines.text: create integers n , t , k , d
read n read t read k read d
create integer time1 with time1 = round up ( double casted ( n / k ) ) * t
lines.code: int time1 = ceil ( ( double ) n / k ) * t ;

lines.text: create integers num_of_cakes , time2 with num_of_cakes = 0
for i = 1 to num_of_cakes is less than n , incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; num_of_cakes < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: if i % t is 0 , increment num_of_cakes by k
if i is greater than d and ( i - d ) % t is 0 , increment num_of_cakes by k
lines.code: if ( i > d && ( i - d ) % t == 0 ) num_of_cakes += k ;

lines.text: print " YES \ n " if time2 is less than time1 else print " NO \ n "
lines.code: ( time2 < time1 ) ? cout << " YES\n " : cout << " NO\n " ;
